Let \Gamma ^\bullet be the functor F \mapsto (\Gamma (X_{n_1\ldots n_r},F^{n_1\ldots n_r})) from sheaves on X_\bullet to r-cosimplicial sets. For small r, we often prefer to write \Gamma ^{\bullet \ldots \bullet } (with r-many copies of \bullet ). We have a co-augmentation \Gamma (X_\bullet ,F^\bullet )\to \Gamma ^\bullet (X_\bullet ,F^\bullet ).
